attributes.action: Call for a General Election now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After weeks of floundering and thrashing in the political deep-end it is time for Gordon Brown and his administration to go. We the people did not give Mr Brown a mandate to govern. We have suffered the current administration's ineptitude for long enough. It is time for the people to decide who is worthy to govern our green isle.

Enough lies, denial, and smoke-screens. Give the people what they want.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
